title: McGraw Hill ALEKS
text: is an adaptive learning platform that personalizes education and support by pinpointing individual student needs. It uses each student's knowledge and tailors learning paths, making math, chemistry and other subjects more engaging and effective.
featureText: McGraw-Hill ALEKS is an adaptive learning platform built on advanced research in Knowledge Space Theory.  It uniquely determines each student's precise knowledge state, offering targeted learning paths for highly effective mastery of math, chemistry, and other complex subjects

features.title: Precision through Knowledge Space Theory
features.text: ALEKS pinpoints knowledge with extreme accuracy using Knowledge Space Theory. This avoids frustration and boredom, promoting high confidence and a deeper understanding of subjects.

features.title: Open-Ended Learning
features.text: ALEKS goes beyond multiple-choice. Its input tools demand authentic problem-solving and deep understanding, better reflecting real-world subject application and preparing students for assessments.

features.title: Constant Assessment for Retention
features.text: ALEKS's automated "Knowledge Checks" consistently reinforce learning. This retrieval practice approach embeds knowledge for long-term retention, leading to a greater chance of mastery.
